sect2.title: RampUpDownMessageGenerator
sect2.para:
The following table shows the properties of the RampUpDownMessageGenerator:
RampUpDownMessageGenerator properties
Property name Description Required Default value
threadQueueSize The size of the task queue. No 1000
preThreadCount Initial number of threads. No Generator's threads value.
preDuration A duration period in milliseconds of "PRE" phase. No Long.MAX_VALUE
rampUpStep A number by which the number of threads is changed in the "RAMP UP" phase. No "0"
rampUpStepPeriod A period in milliseconds after which the number of threads is changed by rampUpStep value. No Long.MAX_VALUE
mainThreadCount A number of threads in the main phase. No Generator's threads value.
mainDuration A duration for which the main phase lasts. No "0"
rampDownStep A number by which the number of threads is changed in the "RAMP DOWN" phase. No "0"
rampDownStepPeriod A period after which the number of threads is changed by rampDownStep value. No Long.MAX_VALUE
postThreadCount Final number of threads. No Generator's threads value.

simplesect.title: An example of RampUpDownMessageGenerator configuration
simplesect.programlisting: ... <generator class="RampUpDownMessageGenerator" threads="100"> <run type="time" value="60000"/> <property name="preThreadCount" value="10"/> <property name="preDuration" value="10000"/> <property name="rampUpStep" value="2"/> <property name="rampUpStepPeriod" value="1000"/> <property name="mainThreadCount" value="20"/> <property name="mainDuration" value="20000"/> <property name="rampDownStep" value="1"/> <property name="rampDownStepPeriod" value="1000"/> <property name="postThreadCount" value="15"/> ... </generator> ...
simplesect.para: In the example above... The scenario starts with 10 threads (preThreadCount). After 10s (preDuration) the number of threads starts to increase by number of 2 (rampUpStep) each second (rampUpStepPeriod) until the number of threads reaches 20 (mainThreadCount). Than after another 20 (mainDuration) seconds the number of threads starts to decrease by 1 (rampDownStep) each second (rampDownStepPeriod) until the number reaches 15 (postThreadCount) which remains until the end of the scenario.
